SettingsItem.Name: Number of simulated days
SettingsItem.Description: The total duration (in days) of the PBK model simulations.

SettingsItem.Name: Number of events per day for the ORAL dietary dose
SettingsItem.Description: The daily dose is administered in equal portions (dose / number of events) per event.

SettingsItem.Name: Number of initial days skipped
SettingsItem.Description: The initial period (or burn-in period, specified in days) that needs to be skipped when calculating the steady-state or peak internal exposures from the simulated time series.

SettingsItem.Name: Number of events per day for the DERMAL dose
SettingsItem.Description: The daily dose is administered in equal portions (dose / number of events) per event.

SettingsItem.Name: Number of events per day for the INHALATION dose
SettingsItem.Description: The daily dose is administered in equal portions (dose / number of events) per event.

SettingsItem.Name: Number of events per day for the ORAL dose
SettingsItem.Description: The daily dose is administered in equal portions (dose / number of events) per event.

SettingsItem.Name: Specify the hours (events).
SettingsItem.Description: Specify the hours on which exposure events are simulated. Allowed numbers are 1, 2, 3, 4,..., 24 separated by spaces.

SettingsItem.Name: Specify event timings
SettingsItem.Description: If checked, a specific sequence of hours on a day can be specified on which exposure events are simulated. Otherwise the events are derived based on the number of exposure events per day.

SettingsItem.Name: Resample PBK model parameter values
SettingsItem.Description: Specifies whether PBK model parameter values are resampled.

SettingsItem.Name: Exposure events and dose generation method
SettingsItem.Description: Generates doses and events for PBK model

SettingsItem.Name: PBK simulation method
SettingsItem.Description: Specifies in which mode to run the PBK model

SettingsItem.Name: Expected life time in years
SettingsItem.Description: The total expected lifetime (in years) of the PBK model.

SettingsItem.Name: Use bodyweight adjusted exposures
SettingsItem.Description: Use bodyweight adjusted exposures in PBK model simulations.

SettingsItem.Name: Number of initial years skipped
SettingsItem.Description: The initial period (or burn-in period, specified in years) that needs to be skipped when calculating the steady-state or peak internal exposures from the simulated time series.
